channel.title: ::yell= Yell+DC
channel.description:
Hey, Just liek the title, when ever i do ::yell other players can see what i yell but then i DC. Info: •317 What I have [code] public void yell(String message) { for (Player p : handler.players) { if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0) || (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) return; if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) continue; client temp = (client) p; if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) temp.sM(message); } } [/code] Customcommand
if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String text = command.substring(4); yell("["+playerName+"]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));}
I would like some help soon :) Thanks.

item.title: ::yell= Yell+DC
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && starter >= 1) { { String text = command.substring(5); if(playerRights==0 && donator == 1) { talk("@gre@[Donator] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==0){ talk("[Player] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==1){ talk("@blu@[Mod] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==2){ talk("@or2@[Admin] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Whoever")) { talk("@red@[Co-Owner] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Itai")) { talk("@red@[Owner] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if(donator==1){ talk("[Player] "+ playerName + ":@bla@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));//H admin } } }
If it cannot find talk change it to yell.

item.description:

Hey, Just liek the title, when ever i do ::yell other players can see what i yell but then i DC.
Info:
•317
What I have

public void yell(String message) { for (Player p : handler.players) { if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0) || (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) return; if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) continue; client temp = (client) p; if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) temp.sM(message); } }

Customcommand

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String text = command.substring(4); yell("["+playerName+"]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));}

I would like some help soon Thanks.
